name: FINDS: Shark Hotspot Forecaster
description: An AI-powered web application to generate and visualize likely shark activity hotspots on a global map using Google's Gemini API. Users can specify a region and number of points to generate a real-time heatmap.

sharks.title: Great White Shark
sharks.caption: Apex predator of the oceans, known for its powerful hunting abilities

sharks.title: Hammerhead Shark
sharks.caption: Distinctive hammer-shaped head provides enhanced sensory capabilities

sharks.title: Tiger Shark
sharks.caption: Large coastal predator with distinctive dark stripes

sharks.title: Whitetip Reef Shark
sharks.caption: Common reef shark with white-tipped fins

sharks.title: Bull Shark
sharks.caption: Aggressive species that can survive in both salt and fresh water

sharks.title: Mako Shark
sharks.caption: Fastest shark species, capable of speeds up to 60 mph
